story:
================The Story================
You are the newest detective to join Cool Town Detective Agency and you’ve just been called out to investigate 
a reported murder at the Old Manor in town. It seems that the town’s founder, Mr. Cool, has been killed.
objective:
================Your Mission================
Your Mission: Solve the case by figuring out who the murderer is and what the murder weapon was. 
Investigate the house, talk to witnesses and suspects, and find evidence to piece together what happened.
howToWin:
================Winning================
Once you think you know the answer, talk to the Police Sergeant to report your findings. 
If you solve the case correctly – you win! If not, your first case at the agency might be your last.
